    • Variable importance calculated based on CP profiles
    Calculates a local variable importance via oscillations of Ceteris Paribus profiles.

    This package is developed by the MI^2 group. MI^2 (pronounce: Am I square?) is a group of mathematicians and computer scientists that love to play with data. We create tools, do consulting and share our positive attitude.
